example.parse: (IP (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 选民)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (ADVP (AD 完全)) (PP-MNR (P 以) (NP (NN 政党))) (VP (VV 作为) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (NN 选择)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 依循)))))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 使得) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (PP-DIR (P 从) (NP-PN (NR 国民党))) (VP (VV 出走)))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 宋楚瑜))) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 凝结) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (ADJP (JJ 另外)) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 股)))) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 强大))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 在野)) (NP (NN 势力)))))))
